alert.note: Alert for Cabarrus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:18PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cabarrus County through 345 PM EDT... At 318 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Downtown Concord, or 6 miles north of Midland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Downtown Concord, Mt Pleasant and Midland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
